A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was a great addition to be sequel trilogy. It wasn't perfect\, but for most Star Wars fans nothing will be as \"perfect\" as the original trilogy. The bad reviews are coming from picky Star Wars fans that are upset it didn't go exactly the way they wanted. The Force Awakens was \"too safe\" and \"too similar\" but now the Last Jedi is \"too different\". Nothing will ever satisfy. With that being said\, it's a great movie ton sit back and enjoy. It should stop being compared so closely to the original trilogy. Yes there should be similar elements\, and yes Star Wars shouldn't strive away from their roots. The Last Jedi has familiar elements while also making it its own unique movie. It was much better than Force Awakens in my opinion.
